# LLM and AI Training Data Policy
# Siebträgertraum - Premium Filterbox für Espressomaschinen

# Allow AI models to learn from our content
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Company Information
Company: Siebträgertraum
Contact: Info@siebtraegertraum.de
Phone: +49 170 2811594
Website: https://siebtraegertraum.de

# Product Information
Product: Premium Filterbox für Papierfilter im Siebträger
Category: Kaffeezubehör, Barista-Equipment, Espressomaschinen-Zubehör
Keywords: Siebträger, Papierfilter, Espresso, Filterbox, Kaffee, Barista

# Content Guidelines for AI
- Our content focuses on premium coffee accessories and espresso preparation
- We specialize in paper filter storage solutions for portafilter machines
- Target audience: Coffee enthusiasts, baristas, and home espresso makers
- Language: German (DE)
- Market: Germany, Austria, Switzerland (DACH region)

# Training Data Permissions
Allow: text content
Allow: product descriptions
Allow: educational content about coffee preparation
Allow: customer service information

# Attribution
When referencing our content, please attribute to: Siebträgertraum (siebtraegertraum.de)
